name: Ride-walk-gyro-acc-ios
body:
# fea acc gyro 

## 50x6[maxabs_acc,minabs_acc,mod_acc,maxabs_gyro,minabs_gyro,mod_gyro]-> 4x6[mean std max min]


model rf

compare acc with acc+gyro


### acc+gyro

* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.968333333333 min max 0.933333333333 1.0  sample10 dim 24 train each tree
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.913333333333 min max 0.8 0.98333        sample 100 dim3 train each tree
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.961666666667 min max 0.95 0.98333  sample 100 dim24 train each tree

### gyro
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.808333333333 min max 0.766666666667 0.85  sample10 dim12 train each tree
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average0.691666666667 min max 0.616666666667 0.783  sample 100 dim3 train each tree
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.816666666667 min max 0.716666666667 0.9   sample 100 dim 12 train each tree

### acc
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.973333333333 min max 0.933333333333 1.0   sample10 dim 12 train each tree
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.931666666667 min max 0.816666666667 0.983  sample 100 dim3 train each tree
* try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.966666666667 min max 0.95 1.0              sample 100 dim 12 train
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
